name: God is a Cube: Programming Robot Cubes
description: An open-ended programming puzzle game where you design Artificial Intelligence with symbols, to control robot cubes and build space pyramids. Inspired by SpaceChem, Lightbot, Human Resource Machine and the Redstone from Minecraft. A game 99% made by one guy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: a 2008 graphics card will be fine (256 Mb RAM) Storage: 600 MB available space
